meanings.definition: Nudibranchs: a type of marine mollusk known for its brightly colored, shell-less body
meanings.sent1: The nudibranchs swam gracefully through the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study nudibranchs to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The nudibranchs had a fashion show to show off their vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: Like living rainbows, nudibranchs brighten the sea floor.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the nudibranchs' colorful bodies.

meanings.definition: Nudibranchs: a group of sea slugs that are often found in coral reefs
meanings.sent1: Explorers discovered a new species of nudibranchs in the coral reef.
meanings.sent2: Tourists enjoy snorkeling to see the nudibranchs in the coral reefs.
meanings.sent3: The nudibranchs in the coral reef had a party to celebrate their uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: Among the coral, nudibranchs stand out like jewels in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The nudibranchs added a pop of color to the coral reef ecosystem.

meanings.definition: Nudibranchs: a species of underwater gastropods with exposed gills and no external shell
meanings.sent1: Divers marveled at the nudibranchs' delicate features.
meanings.sent2: The nudibranchs crawled along the ocean floor in search of food.
meanings.sent3: A nudibranchs' family reunion turned into a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: In the depths of the sea, nudibranchs dance with the currents.
meanings.sent5: The nudibranchs' exposed gills help them breathe underwater.
